snippet.title: ❄Frostpunk: Beyond the Ice❄ - Early Access Pre-Registration Open🎊
snippet.description:
❄The official mobile version of the bestselling Frostpunk IP❄

"Captain! I spot a Generator over there!"

Introducing one of Com2uS' exciting new projects for 2024!

We are thrilled to announce the pre-registration opening for ❄ Frostpunk: Beyond the Ice ❄ in the United States, United Kingdom, and the Philippines!

Immerse yourself in a survival city-building simulation, guiding survivors through the challenges of a sudden ice age on Earth!

☃ Pre-Registration Link (US/UK/Philippines): https://play.withhive.com/b?i=13083&g=13077
